title: History of Australia (PC)
brief_description: Provides a detailed account of Australia’s history based on a thematic format with significant events. Contains over 50 minutes of video and hundreds of pictures. The CD-ROM has lots of features such as notes and highlights, memory function and advanced search functions and is an excellent educational resource. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: MPC compliant PC386 DX, Hard disk, CD-ROM, Windows 3.1, 256 colour windows display driver. Also runs in Windows 95.
